column4: How do I uninstall the unstable version of Google Chrome from my computer?
sudo apt-remove google-chrome or chrome whatever the package is called
or just use synpatic which would be easier
Did you look for the package in synaptic like I told you?
You can also search using "search" for the package name
Take a look at the installed packages in synaptic, open up your package manager
Let me get the name of the package, hold on please
You need to use the terminal to do that, if you didn't know
You are not typing the right thing... sudo apt-get remove chromium-browser
Sorry I left out the apt-get part
oh error... that was just what I thought the package name might be
you will need to search for the package name
there are other ways to see if you are online than type "test"
